goal: Organize and provide access to development methodology and protocol skills
acceptance_criteria: Development sub-skills are organized under dev parent
Focus boundary control is available via dev/focus-boundary
TDD implementation protocol is available via dev/std-dev-impl
Developers can discover and invoke development best practices

features.name: Focus Boundary Control
features.test_scenario: Given need to control AI autonomy, When I invoke dev/focus-boundary, Then agent applies appropriate creativity and scope limits
features.expected_result: AI behavior matches selected focus level (0=full, 1=minimal+constrained, 2=minimal+unrestricted)

features.name: Structured TDD Implementation
features.test_scenario: Given feature to implement, When I invoke dev/std-dev-impl, Then agent follows 5-phase protocol with user collaboration gates
